content: AMA The Fifth Person Lifestyle Investments Asked by Isaac ChanAsked on 21 Feb 2019Who is your favourite investor? Warrent Buffet ? Ray Dalio? ?Personally, I enjoy both of them thoroughly, and have learnt immensely from them, not just in investing but just in the principles and values that they carry2 answersAnswerBump2

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,My favourite investors are Warren Buffett, Charile Munger, Peter Lynch, Claries Barnes, Howard Mark and Allan Mecham0 comments0

Terence Tan, Finance at Singapore Management UniversityLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 21 Feb 2019I have a friend/partner who is very into Warren Buffett and followed him closelly. Last year, when everyone fare reasonably lousy, he was upwards 31%.https://www.simpleinvestorsg.com/my-2018-review/His investment style is one in a million. For me, I tried to be near him but still not enough. I was down about 8% to 10% last year.0 comments0
